channel.title: Blog on Adam Kochan
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on Adam Kochan

item.title: 'how i'm feeling now' - Charli XCX Review
item.description: If you wanna go back to the January 2022 Hub click here. “Am I a hyperpop fan now?" Score: 7.5/10 Stand-Out Song: “forever” Other Favs: “7 years”, “enemy”, “c2.0”, “visions” Recommended if You Like: 100 gecs, chiptunes vocals, SOPHIE Coming into this album I thought I knew two things: I didn’t like any hyperpop song Charli XCX was a one hit wonder from “Boom Clap” I am happy to report I was wrong on both things.

item.title: 'Sleep Well Beast' - The National
'Max & Match' - Loona (Odd Eye Circle)
item.description: If you wanna go back to the January 2022 Hub click here. “Can you have a bias if you think all the girls in the group are great?" Score: 8/10 Stand-Out Song: ‘Sweet Crazy Love’ Other Favs: ‘Girl Front’, ‘Chaotic’, ‘ODD Front’ Recommended if You Like: TWICE, Blackpink, “5th Harmony” I guess Well that was such an enjoyable, short, concise album. This being a subgroup of Loona a band I already like (go listen to ‘Star’) allowed me to spend the album getting to know these three voices in particular.

item.title: '22, A Million' - Bon Iver Review
item.description: If you wanna go back to the January 2022 Hub click here. “A Beautiful, yet Abrasive Album” Score: 9/10 Stand-Out Song: “00000 Million” Other Favs: “29 #Stafford APTS”, “33 “GOD””, “666 (upside down t)” Recommended if You Like: The Outro of “Runaway” by Kanye West If I had to describe this album in one word it would be “difficult”. Seriously, upon first listen to this album it almost wants you to turn it off.

item.title: 'This Is Happening' - LCD Soundsystem Review
item.description: If you wanna go back to the January 2022 Hub click here. “Go Listen to Dance Yself Clean, Now” Score: 7/10 Stand-Out Song: “Dance Yrself Clean” Other Favs: “All I Want”, “You Wanted a Hit”, “Home” Recommended if You Like: Set-Up and Payoff in Your Music Go listen to Dance Yself Clean. That could be the album review and I feel that would get 95% of my point across.

item.title: 'It's Album Time' - Todd Terje Review
'Weezer (The White Album)' - Weezer Review
'The Most Beautiful Moment in Life: Young Forever' - BTS Review
'Trust In The Lifeforce Of The Deep Mystery' - The Comet is Coming Review
'SKA DREAM' - Jeff Rosenstock Review
'Run The Jewels 2' - Run The Jewels Review
'A Deeper Understanding' - The War on Drugs Review
item.description: If you wanna go back to the January 2022 Hub click here. “Some of the BEST instrumentation I have ever heard of all time, some of the lyrics I have heard of all time” Score: 7.5/10 Stand-Out Song: Pain Other Favs: Holding On, Strangest Thing, In Chains Recommended if You Like: Bruce Springsteen, Guitars I’m really in between two minds on this album, the musicality is actually some of the best I have heard.

item.title: 'Melodrama' - Lorde Review
item.description: If you wanna go back to the January 2022 Hub click here. “Man who thought Lorde was a 1-Hit wonder SHOCKED when the Whole Album Bops” Score: 8/10 Stand-Out Song: Green Light (Is this too Safe?) Other Favs: Homemade Dynamite, The Lourve, Liability, Hard Feels, Supercut Recommended if You Like: Carly Rae Jepsen, Bleachers, Literally any Jack Antonoff Produced Album Ever Ok Lorde, I’m sorry that’s on me, here I was thinking you were a 1-hit wonder and I hated that hit (Royals is Overhyped, fite me), this album showed me I was completely wrong.

item.title: 'Wide Awake!' - Parquet Courts Review
item.description: If you wanna go back to the January 2022 Hub click here. “If you are looking to head bang to smart, political punk this is the album for you” Score: 7/10 Stand-Out Song: Almost Had to Start a Fight/In and Out of Paitience Other Favs: Tenderness, FreeBird II, Before The Water Gets Too High, Wide Awake Recommended if You Like: The Strokes, Franz Ferdinand, The Clash, “Harder” LCD Soundsystem Well that was fun, This is like if you took LCD Soundsystem, added in some Franz Ferdinand, some Scott Pilgrim vs the World, and then gave them a Political Channel on Youtube.

item.title: January 2022 Album Reviews
item.description: Note: I’ll update these with the link to the review as they get listened to! Injury Reserve - By the Time I Get to Phoenix Death Grips - The Money Store Sufjan Stevens - Carrie & Lowell LCD Soundsystem - This is Happening King Gizzard & The Lizard Wizard - Nonagon Infinity Bon Iver - 22, A Million Parquet Courts - Wide Awake! DJ Sabrina The Teenage DJ - Charmed Lorde - Melodrama The National - Sleep Well Beast The War on Drugs - A Deeper Understanding George Clanton - Slide LOONA - Max & Match Roisin Murphy - Roisin Machine The Comet is Coming - Trust In The Lifeforce of the Deep Mystery Low - Quorum / Dancing and Blood / Fly Grizzly Bear - Shields Weezer - Weezer (The White Album) BTS - The Most Beautiful Moment in Life: Young Forever D’Angelo - Black Messiah tricot - Jodeki (上出来) BADBADNOTGOOD - Talk Memory Charli XCX - How I’m Feeling Now Gorillaz - Plastic Beach Todd Terje - It’s Album Time Fiona Apple - The Idler Wheel Is Wiser Than the Driver of the Screw and Whipping Cords Will Serve You More Than Ropes Will Ever Do Jeff Rosenstock - SKA Dream Run The Jewels - Run The Jewels 2
